Title: I Love You, Goodbye
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Carina Adly MacKenzie, Michael Narducci, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries"), Marguerite MacIntyre (story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (executive story editor)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: With the final preparations for her union to Jackson underway, Hayley begins to question whether the ritual will actually work. After arriving to the compound, Elijah has a tense encounter ...
